website_summaries.verdict: An affordable primer that is ideal for oily skin and has many of the same benefits of pricier primers.
pros: Lightweight formula that helps control oil without drying skin
Helps smooth skin and contains soluble collagen to keep skin moisturized
Light pink color brightens skin's appearance
cons: Texture can sometimes be too slick

customer_reviews.title: Not the real one
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real product, the real one which I originally bought for $20 at Sephora was not as much like a lotion as this one is. The original is more transparent pink color and works so much better than this product. This one has to be fake there is no way this is the real no poreblem primer. I’m going to buy one at Sephora and I will show you a side by side picture of the difference when I get it. No stars
customer_reviews.author: Shasta Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that works for me
customer_reviews.text: Im 44 and the past 4 years my skin has been throwing a hissy fit.No matter what I tried my pores were screaming through my makeup. You know what I mean? Makeup sinking into the pores will turn any good foundation into a pool party on your face. Finally a month ago I found no poreproblem. For me it really works. I have combo-dry skin weather depending. I do not find it makes my skin oily but maybe its not friendly to all skin types specifically oily. My foundation sets nicely over it (no sinking)and stays on for about 8 hours before needing a touch up. And of course my pores...barely visible!!!! Im happy
customer_reviews.author: KPak

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical about if this was the same primer ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about if this was the same primer I got (and adored) on my ipsy glam bag and discovered it's legit! Made in Korea so the ingredients aren't in English.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Slippery and has no staying power
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this stuff so bad but I just can't. It's awful. Goes on so slippery and I actually think that my makeup goes on worse with it on than without it. My foundation completely wipes away with even the slightest touch and it lessens the coverage somehow? Also, my usually long-wearing foundation is gone after an hour or two? It does the opposite of what it's supposed to do. Never buying it again. Probably throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: SP03

customer_reviews.title: I love how this product gives such a smooth base for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how this product gives such a smooth base for foundation or powder and does well to hide pores. It's definitely NOT non-comedogenic (it has silicone listed a few times). Since I just learned there are silicone free primers I will probably give one a try when this is gone since I'm sick of squeezing black heads (sorry tmi) . It does give a flawless finish tho and also helps my eyebrow pencil and Wunderbrow last longer. I haven't had any major breakouts (I almost never do) but I have noticed more small blemishes since using
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: WHAT?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a Samsung screen protector came ??????
customer_reviews.author: Yen nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive, oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This primer goes on super smooth and clear Makes my skin incredibly soft Helps my BB cream and eye shadow stay on Cons: Gave me cystic acne bumps on my cheeks, which I've NEVER had before (and vanished when I stopped using this) Did absolutely nothing for my pores Made me EXTREMELY oily throughout the day **UPDATE: Cannot use as an eye lid primer as it breaks out my skin wherever applied. I have removed the 3 stars and taken down to 1.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Apple

customer_reviews.title: Really really terrible. Worse than I ever thought possible.
customer_reviews.text: Made my skin peel and flake off after just 2 uses. Made my makeup separate and last for less time than usual. Tiny pimples broke out on my cheeks which is not a problem area of mine. Really bummed that I wasted money and jacked up my skin. I’m a very comfortable makeup user, and was looking for something that wouldn’t break the bank and helped my everyday makeup stay on well and go on smooth, but you couldn’t pay me to use this product again given what it did to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Raley

customer_reviews.title: The Holy grail for large pores
customer_reviews.text: This primer is a Godsend for those with large pores. I have tried just about everything on the market from drugstore to high end in an attempt to disguise my enlarged pores. Nothing has worked like this product. I will never use another primer again. Just a tip, it will accentuate dry skin so make sure to heavily moisturize any dry areas before use.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: I just recently started getting into the art of makeup and I was hearing great benefits about primer. Until this year I didn’t wear any primer , let alone foundation so I wanted to try out something since I have combination skin. Usually I am more oily around my T zone. I heard about this brand so I thought I would try it out. It’s already been a few hours and everything is the way it was when I applied my makeup! It feels lightweight and it took the foundation great.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for pores
customer_reviews.text: This goes on very silky but does absolutely zero for concealing pores. I have dry sensitive skin and it didn't irritate it, although it does smell strongly like baby powder, which I hate. I gave gave it to a friend since I couldn't return it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Does not make you concealer roll off!
customer_reviews.text: I have larger pores in my cheeks and oily skin. and this does an amazing job at filling them in whirling keeping me matte. If I need to freshen up the makeup for a longer day, there is no need to add additional concealer to my dark circles. I just put a little powder on.
customer_reviews.author: Tish Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I feel compelled to review this item. I have tried Smashbox, Laura Mercier, Hourglass, Elf and another few primers over the years but I really think this one is superior and does what it’s advertised for. It goes on smoothly and smells good, blurs pores and fine lines, and grips my It Cosmetics CC cream nicely. Stays on all day and doesn’t make me shiny/greasy which tends to happen especially in warm weather. I am so satisfied that I’m thinking of trying out the foundation of this same brand. So far it’s my Holy Grail primer!
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: I do not see any improvement or difference...
customer_reviews.text: Okay I actually discovered this product through a " must have" makeup..somewhere online. It is supposed to minimize pores(I guess). The instructions need to be specific. On the box all it says is to start by applying a thin layer and then building slowly. Something like that. I saw maybe a 5% improvement. As far as the best primer pore reducer? Estee lauder, perfectionist. I'd guess 'no pores no problem' works good for skin that really isn't a problem. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Car

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy the green. Not the same at all
customer_reviews.text: I love the pink primer of this brand. It is amazing. So I thought maybe the green color correcting base would be just as dreamy, but man was I wrong. The green primer is very loose and not like a gel consistency you’d expect after using the pink primer. It also smells weird and chemically and doesn’t do a thing for your skin. It makes my makeup ruddy and gives the coverage a weird sticky feeling. The 1 star review is for the green product. But I give 5 stars for the OG pink primer. Don’t buy the green!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer6850

customer_reviews.title: I was so hoping this would be awesome, but it was a complete FAIL
customer_reviews.text: If you are oily at all - KEEP MOVING! I gave it a go for a week and my makeup was MIA at the end of the day even with Urban Decay setting spray, setting powder and baking! I was so hoping this would be awesome, but it was a complete FAIL. Not a seller issue at all, completely a product issue.
customer_reviews.author: KT KP

customer_reviews.title: I do like it and it has a soft fragrance that isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this after coming across some reviews online. It stated it didn't dry the skin, but helped reduce pore size. I do like it and it has a soft fragrance that isn't offensive. Did it really dramatically reduce the pore size on my mid cheeks when make up is on? I'd say it helps a little, but not dramatically. I don't have really large pores so thought it would blur the few I have on my mid cheek area as I have high cheek bones. Works well as a primer generally, but pore reduction is only about 15% or so.
customer_reviews.author: TravelerTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and NO RETURNS - Scam!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Greasy slick oily. My makeup turned from cream to liquid and the slightest touch would move or remove it. Unfortunately I missed the no return policy... no wonder, this is a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flawless Makeup and Feels Great on the skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love and love this Primer. It felt absolutely different once you apply it, it has kinda this silky texture, not silicone type feeling at all, maybe slight but not disturbing at all. My makeup stays flawless the entire day and my pores we're vanished which is A.M.A.Z.I.N.G!!!!! Highly recommend this palette and I featured it on my Instagram as well. xxx CaydaaWardrobe on Instagram
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It Made Me Break Out! 😔
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. I read some great reviews. I ordered it a week ago and I started breaking out immediately...the next day! I saw two pimples. I do have oily skin but I rarely break out (now that I'm older!) I've been using it daily and every morning I have at least 1 or 2 more pimples. I also started getting oily an hour after putting this on. It had ZERO oil control for me. Unfortunately, I'm returning. I'll be going back to my previous primer (avon...which never made me break out). If you have sensitive skin this probably isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Karin Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Not for me 😔
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this one compared to the other pink colored primer in this brand. This honestly smelled like chemical almost like diluted chlorine for me. It didn't moisturize either for me. Caused major hives for me around chin. 🤢
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka Kumar

customer_reviews.title: It was heavy and sticky.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the positive reviews, this product was a big disappointment. I have aging skin and rosacea, needing both moisture and something to neutralize the red. This was more like a horrible foundation. It was sticky and didn't feel like it absorbed into my skin, it also washed me out. I looked more tired after I put this on. The one positive of this product is that a little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great primer, it feels like putting on a moisturizer. I like the scent, it's very faint. It covers your pores pretty well, keeps your makeup on and gives you a smooth base to work with. I don't think it does anything for fine lines but I mostly wanted it for my pores and I really enjoy it. I can see my pores a little but it's not bad. I would recommend trying it. You get it a bit cheaper on amazon than in sephora.
customer_reviews.author: kellie

customer_reviews.title: This is the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh..finally! I am 52 with large pores, even skin texture and am ALWAYS looking for something to smooth out my skin and kind of blur the pores. I can't even begin to tell you how many primers I have tried - high end, expensive to the cheaper brands. All were disappointing - until now. This is an AWESOME primer. Of course it doesn't give me perfect skin, but it really smooths out my skin texture and blurs pores. It's comfortable to wear, not heavy or sticky. No scent. Can't beat the price. Really helps makeup stay in place. I LOVE this primer. I will never be without this primer!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Not good for acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I used it for about a week and it caused a bad breakout all over my cheek. Its the only new product I added to my routine so i knew that it was the culprit. As soon as i stopped using it, my breakout healed and no new acne appeared. The smell of the product is very purfumy which was a red flag. I also didn't notice that it even blurred my pores very well but have some pretty big pores so it was a long shot anyway. Just be wary if you have sensitve skin
customer_reviews.author: Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Nice primer! Just ONE thing...
customer_reviews.text: This was my go-to primer for a few months! I switched over to a different primer for a bit and when I went back to this one, the product was hard to pump out of the bottle and came out very stiff and an odd consistency. Four stars because it works great and made my foundation last long. Great job at filling pores and smoothing the skin! Lost one star because the product changes if you don’t finish the entire product quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: My face is both aging and an oil slick. I’ve used a huge array of primers and I’m very happy with this one. I have used if for several days and it really works well. It both smoothed fine lines and did a great job maintaining my makeup throughout the day. This product is a must try! I also used it without makeup and saw a nice improvement with my skin. It goes on well and dries quickly. I’ve also noticed that it does not slough off when using multiple products! I’ve had problems with other products that start to roll off when applying my base.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT  BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This product is COUNTERFEIT and I am so disappointed that Amazon would allow this to be sold on their site! It is a watery substance that in NO WAY hides pores. It appears to be another product from China. When I saw how worthless it was, I attempted to return it. Unfortunately it cannot be returned. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Frost

customer_reviews.title: What is all the hype for?
customer_reviews.text: If only. If only this lived up to the hype. I don't want to pay top dollar for my primer. Honest. I want an amazing product that doesn't break the bank. Maybe this is GREAT and FABULOUS and AMAZING for younger skin? This 53 year old is sticking with her Porefessional. This product dried me out and made no noticeable difference for my pores/pore size and it really was like using nothing. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Value,
customer_reviews.text: Just got this liquid today. The packaging is cute, the liquid feels creamy and balmy. The scent is strong but not overwhelming, though it might be for some. The texture is liquid until it evaporates and leaves behind a powdery finish. I’m disappointed that it’s not as thick as Benefit Porefessional or Dr Brandt’s Pore No More. But this is a fraction of the cost in a giant bottle. Expect to layer on three layers if your pores are large and numerous like mine. It also doesn’t look as good without an foundation or other tint as Dr Brandt’s would. But for the price and size this is a pretty good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Brown

customer_reviews.title: It's a good mid-tier product
customer_reviews.text: Application: Goes on smooth, only need a little Texture: Very smooth, but almost greasy Priming: Used with Fenty Beauty foundation which is a matte so definitely needs a primer and the foundation went on smooth with the primer and sat nice. The foundation sat well for about 6 hours though I am not sure it was really because of the primer or if it would have been the same with only my Murad matte moisturizer. I also didn't see any filling of pores but it did smooth some of the texture. Overall, okay. Somewhere between Elf and Benefit.
customer_reviews.author: XanyaeTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed! Doesnt make me break out, goes on easily (A little goes a long way so I know the bottle will last a bit). Ive used it with liquid foundation, mineral and BB Cream. All look so much better with this as a base. My teen daughter has also fallen in love and I have to hunt my bottle down when I want it. She has typical teen hormonal girl skin and this has done wonders for her confidence. Before, foundation caked onto blemishes and into healing dry patches- now she can use foundation and it looks natural. Packaging is adorable! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this product. I read loads of great reviews & was excited to try. The texture is soft & feels smooth upon application however, it doesn’t feel as though it stays in place once you’ve applied foundation especially with a brush. Overall, not worth money & felt like a very cheap product line. Will not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy6

customer_reviews.title: DIDNT GET WHAT I WANTED
customer_reviews.text: Don't order this I was looking forward to trying out this primer since everyone was so hyped about it and I recieved a screen protector?? HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Kiana

customer_reviews.title: Scented Dimethicone
customer_reviews.text: This product is essentially scented dimethicone. It is what gives it it's smooth texture and makes it sit on your skin without sinking in. Dimethicone is used in all sorts of beauty products, but this product goes overboard. Google dimethicone. It is used as a natural lice killer because it smothers the louse, and they die because they can't breathe. This product does not let your skin breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many primers and they always leave my skin greasy, which doesn't help my skin that gets shiny as the day goes on. This primer does a great job of going on soft, but also creating a barrier for your makeup - it's weird how it goes from a moisturizer to feeling powdery, but without actually drying your face at all. I believe that since using it my makeup has lasted longer and I'm not seeing that super shine toward the end of my workday.
customer_reviews.author: William Skehan

customer_reviews.title: Nice primer at great price
customer_reviews.text: This primer is super silky and has a great light scent. I kept seeing it recommended on youtube videos so I finally tried it. I normally don't like silicone primers like smashbox or the ordinary so I wasn't sure I would like this. This is very nice and somehow seems to blur the pores. You can't beat the price and it feels great on the skin. I didn't get oily with this.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: One of the best primers you'll ever find
customer_reviews.text: My favorite primer EVER! Goes on so velvety and smooth, it's perfectly mattifying while also moisturizing on the skin and totally smoothes and evens out the look of any fine lines and pores. I love putting this one after my regular moisturizer and just before applying makeup. It lasts all day and yet it's such a nice and light primer it doesnt feel thick or heavy at all, it just makes my skin so silky and smoothe and creates such a radiant look that I love using it on my face even on days I dont apply makeup!:) This stuff is perfect. It doesnt cause breakouts or irritate my skin or anything. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: willowp

customer_reviews.title: Not made for dry skin or mixed oil/dry.
customer_reviews.text: So this is my experience and make up is different for all of us. With that said I really wanted to love this product ! I really did! It's affordable and BoxyCharm was buzzing all about!! So I caved and bought it. For me... it was a horrible miss. My skin is a mix of dry and oily so even after using a thick moisturizer before hand, it separated on my face. My pores didn't disappear and the foundation fell into my pores and created fine lines I really don't have. I'm still on the hunt to find a better pore coverage. This isn't it and it drys out your skin.
customer_reviews.author: CynthiaS.

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out every time, not good
customer_reviews.text: I really was looking forward to this primer but it has make me break out every time I’ve used it (I rarely break out). Thought it was a fluke but have stopped and started using it and every time I have broke out. Wanted to return it due to reaction but there is a no return policy. Hope you don’t have this outcome, but if you do you’re out...
customer_reviews.author: MamaBearReyes

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: This primer is awesome! It's my first time using primer. I went by the reviews and this primer did not disappoint! I didn't understand what the whole point of primer was in the first place. Now that I've used it for the past two weeks, I could never go back to using just foundation. The primer is super gentle and glides amazingly over my skin. My makeup stays put now and looks just as amazing in the evening as it did in the morning when I put it on! It's great!
customer_reviews.author: tgtbt

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite primer.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a primer I'm happy with. I have been searching for a primer I like having on my face and that goes on easy and does what it says. This goes on smooth, no clumping, gives a small amount of pore coverage, without feeling like I have layers of stuff on my skin. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl mcclamma

customer_reviews.title: Lies! My pores are still huge and visible.
customer_reviews.text: Unless I'm doing it wrong. (I'm not)🤣 This product SUCKS! It doesn't do what it claims. It's more of a moisturizer to me, the texture is amazing but I have very large pores on my cheeks, on both sides. Smells good, feels great but it made no difference at all and I used a decent amount. 🤷🏽‍♀️ This is the 4th primer I've tried and again I'm disappointed. Not only does it not work, but it's not returnable. I'm going to try for a 3rd application with this product and if my review changes I will update it...if not then don't waste your money. 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Oily skin with pores the size of craters?? This helps!
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin, and problematic pores. I was skeptical in the claims for this product. A primer to blur pores and also to mattify oily skin. I received this and was immediately expecting some watery primer that instantly absorbed into my skin upon application. Not so. Its a thicker silicone type consistency and upon applying it starts to mattify and fill in the pores. I figured since its basically just laying on top of my skin that it would make my foundation roll up or turn it into this weird patchy mess. But it doesn't do that. It truly does as it says! Try it.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Broke out really bad
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness. This worked great night of and then the next day I broke out everywhere! I’ve never had so many whiteheads and irritation. Broke out so bad, wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay D.

customer_reviews.title: Silicone is bad
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know this product had silicone prior to purchasing which is my fault for not researching it. I use cream makeup and silicone primer is NOT for cream makeup. They just don't mix!
customer_reviews.author: BriWadd

customer_reviews.title: light feeling
customer_reviews.text: This primer is very light feeling on the skin. I love that it doesn't create a cakey feeling like some of the other pore filling primers (Benefit, Dr Brandt, etc). It's very smoothing and does fill the pores a bit. I find it very similar to NYX Angel Veil and Hourglass Veil Mineral but not so drying and better for dry skin. I tend to have sensitive skin that gets dehydrated and oily so this has been good for me. You only need a little bit so this will last forever. Good primer.
customer_reviews.author: AlyxTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: this one feels a bit more "slick" and "oily" like silicon? I haven't checked the ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product when I saw a video of how it worked on the peels of an orange. It does cover your pores well, BUT I have oily, acne-prone skin. I realized that compared to other primers that I have used, this one feels a bit more "slick" and "oily" like silicon? I haven't checked the ingredients, so don't quote me on that. Compared to my other primers, it doesn't last as long, so that was a bummer. If you have dry, or combo skin, I would recommend, but for oily, I would be wary. Overall, a decent product!
customer_reviews.author: Naanhee K.

customer_reviews.title: Flawless Makeup Evverytime
customer_reviews.text: This is my all-time favorite primer. I initially got to try this in a beauty box and used it all. I was like I have to get some more of this. It is perfect for those with mature skin as it really helps to minimize your pores, prevents your makeup from settling into fine lines, eliminates false wrinkles that can be caused by the foundation, and my makeup looks amazing. It doesn't have a harsh scent either like its prime essence version, which I do not like
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ritzman

customer_reviews.title: Works so well!
customer_reviews.text: I have combo skin, and the dry parts tend to get super flaky, and the oily parts get very shiny and greasy. I love this primer because it surpsisingly controls oil very well without drying me out. It also helps everythin apply smoothly. I put it to the test at work, and i gotta say it held up beautifully. I'm a dog groomer, so I'm constantly moving around, near water, dryers and I can get pretty sweaty. I'm happy to say this kept my bb cream looking nicely though an 8 hour shift! (Some blotting in between)
customer_reviews.author: D.G.

customer_reviews.title: ended up purchasing a bare minerals primer that i like a lot better
customer_reviews.text: Product did not fill in my pores and made multiple foundations patchy, ended up purchasing a bare minerals primer that i like a lot better
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for price point
customer_reviews.text: This product is silky and smooths out my skin and pores. It helps keep my make up in place... I work 15hr days so it’s nice to not look horrible at midnight. The smell is decent. If I use to much it does slide around and makes the makeup run or move. So a little does go along way. Also i have to make sure the lotion and other products are “dried” before applying this or it just gets caked
customer_reviews.author: Stefani johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't cover/minimize my pores
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't impressed with this product. I like the NYX Pore Filler. It has a better coverage for my pores and fine lines. As you can see in my photo my pores are still showing after foundation and powder application. The NYX pore filler doesn't make my foundation slip and slide all over my face like this one does. Very disappointed because it had great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Maiya

customer_reviews.title: I'm sad this went so fast
customer_reviews.text: I'm sad this went so fast. I'm not a daily makeup user, maybe 4 out of 7 days, and It hasn't even been two months and I'm ordering more. I use one pump worth and it covers most of my face. I'm hooked on the silky feel it gives my skin and my makeup goes on flawless as long as my skin is exfoliated. My makeup doesn't move all day either. I never feel like it's sliding or melting off my face even in East coast August humidity.
customer_reviews.author: ash3s

customer_reviews.title: New favorite primer ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer! It took me some time to get used to because I was using a drier formula primer before this for combating oily skin. This one however is soft and velvety and almost like a moisturizer, it smells amazing like a fresh sweet scent that is not irritating. It really makes a difference in smoothing my face under makeup and keeps it all in place and shine free for the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Artemis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t understand the hype
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the big deal about this is. It did t change a thing about my makeup. The only reason I’m giving it two stars is because it’s moisturizing? And that may be me being generous. It’s really nothing special.. save your money do some research and buy a good primer elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best primer I have ever used. I have tried many other expensive primers over the years, and somehow by the end of the day all my makeup has slid off my skin even long lasting makeup. This primer does everything and more. My makeup stays on my face all day long, with a very soft matte finish. I assume if I use a more luminous foundation it was stay luminous all day. I highly recommend it especially if you've got combination skin. It's got a wonderful rosy smel,l and it makes my skin very very soft. I'm addicted and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the first primers that I purchased when I started getting into make up but didnt want to spend a lot. To me, this is as good are benefits Porefessional - but its a fraction of the price. It fills in pores and other small crevices on your skin. Your face is super smooth to the touch and looks amazing. I cant say enough positive things about this primer.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great new primer
customer_reviews.text: I have been avoiding primer for quite some time as my aesthetician mentioned primer could be causing my breakouts. It's been about a little over a year since using primer and I am sick of my make up falling off my face after 4 hours. This stuff is great - very hydrating like-serum consistency. I recommend letting it sit for a couple minutes to dry before applying foundation/concealer. This gave me an oil-free, matte and long lasting look.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: It's an adequate primer in that it preps my skin and holds my makeup well, but without my usual moisturizing routine, I was seeing a little more frequent breakouts or dryness. It also didn't provide as much pore coverage for me as it seems to have done for others. I'm okay with the scent and will likely keep using this until it runs out, but I won't buy another unless the ones sold by Sephora are indeed different/better.
customer_reviews.author: waywardchase

customer_reviews.title: Combo/Oily Skin
customer_reviews.text: I'm always on a look out for a good primer for my combo/oily skin. My sister received this product from her makeup subscription and told me all about it. I tried it on... and OMG! This stuff gave me soft and supple skin for makeup application. My large pores were completely blurred and it left a light scene "rose" like scent on my face which didn't bother me, but would to some people.
customer_reviews.author: ashsparkle

customer_reviews.title: Good primer for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I do see a slight difference using this vs not using primer. I’m a newbie with a face primer so I think this is a great beginners primer or for a light makeup look. The smell is really addicting and it is easy to apply with fingers. It does blur my pores but to an extent: I have pores on my nose that can not be truly hidden, but this primer made it look less like several craters and more like normal skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product but the plastic seal was ripped and the oil was not in the package. Paid a little more to try the oil but it was ripped off the package.
customer_reviews.author: emiranda64

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff with rosacea!
customer_reviews.text: I had been having trouble finding a primer that helped my t-zone be less oily in warm weather and that didn't have ingredients that bothered my rosacea. I tried probably a dozen at different price points and this is the first one that worked! It doesn't dry my skin out and has a nice natural look. I have a few larger pores that I had to use a second thicker primer over but I have to do that with all primers. Was very happy to find this product!
customer_reviews.author: DawnR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Ever since using this before doing my make up, I have had less acne issues after going a full day and night dressed up. Doesn’t take much and is worth it. Also means I use less of my foundation now since it spreads so nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor G.

customer_reviews.title: The super smoother!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this primer because I saw an ad on social media and let me tell you, I’m unbelievably glad I did!! This product does exactly what it promises. It’s the perfect base to smooth your skin; your pores are practically gone once you apply this! I use a tinted moisturizer over it because that’s all I need. This works better than some of the more expensive primers I’ve used. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Ko

customer_reviews.title: Pore Filling Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I am utterly stunned at how good this primer is. I randomly heard about this primer on a Ulta review and decided to take a chance on it after reading some of the reviews and boy I'm glad I did. This primer does such an amazing job at filling my pores and giving me a real smooth finish. Oddly enough the smell is really nice and reminds me of an old body spray from Victoria Secret that I used to wear way back in middle school. So all in all I love this primer and I'll be keeping it in my makeup bag for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Masters

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail primer
customer_reviews.text: This primer is definitely my holy grail! It is very light and smooth going on, and provides a great surface for makeup. There is no real scent, which is a plus, and it’s much more reasonable than benefit’s porefessional, which is an equivalent product. I will buy this forever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oily skin approved
customer_reviews.text: Myself who has oily skin, this really hides my pores and makes my makeup literally last all day. I'm talking about at least 7-8 hours. I do recommend upon application, let the primer set into the skin before going in with foundation or concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Britanny Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this primer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this primer! I got a sample size in my Ipsy bag and could not turn back. It keeps my face looking matte all day and no need to even reapply! I have oily skin and have tried LOTS of primers and this is BY FAR my favorite! The price isn't so bad either!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Rizkalla

customer_reviews.title: #gamechanger
customer_reviews.text: This primer is AMAZING!! I usually use the ELF poreless putty primer but wanted to try something different...well I won't be using anything else from now on!! This primer blurs pores to the point that you can barely see them and I have large pores on my nose and apples of my cheeks. It feels super smooth too and moisturizes at the same time!! Get it now!!
customer_reviews.author: jenni

customer_reviews.title: READ MY FULL REVIEW!!
customer_reviews.text: I read a bunch of reviews on this primer before I bought it & it was soo worth it!! 😍 it smells soo good & is very light to the touch. Applies silky & smooth ❤️ I personally, have prominent pores & it did a pretty good job of minimizing them. FOR OILY SKIN PEOPLE it works good for a couple of hours keeping your oils at bay. Continue to powder & pat away, through the day, if you have excessive oils. Overall, pretty decent product for the price 👌
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but does the job
customer_reviews.text: So I originally bought the no porebelm original serum in pink. I have red skin so I tried this version as well. It definitely does the job! It’s just a little thicker/pigmented than I would like For a primer. But better that it does cancel out redness vs nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out & turn into an oil slick.
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin. I have always use Smashbox primer. I decided to try this primer because it was much less expensive and had great reviews. This did not work for me. It ended up breaking me out and making my skin extremely oily. My foundation did not go on smooth. Since I can’t return it, I’ll have to throw it or give it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good primer! I bought it bc of Jeffrey star’s review. It wasn’t “like photoshop in a bottle” for me personally, but it worked well. Just as well as it did for any other high end pore filling primer does for me, such as benefit or smash box! My friend tried it and she loved it though! It comes in a pretty glass bottle and the consistency is so smooth without being greasy. It’s also great to get it here bc ulta/sephora was selling it for over 20 I think?? So definitely buy it here!
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Nice, non drying primer
customer_reviews.text: I really love this primer. My skin is usually oily so I usually wear a oil control primer; which this is not. But I have dry days, so I use this when I don't want to strip my skin. It's got a really nice texture, and it doesn't bother my sensitive skin. Plus it makes my skin look super smooth. But why did I take off one star? It doesn't blur my pores; but I have yet to find a primer that can successfully do that. But, to all primers defense, my pores are like craters, so I probably never will.
customer_reviews.author: Melio

customer_reviews.title: Love This Primer
customer_reviews.text: I've used this primer for awhile now and keep buying more when I run out. It's super silky and light on your skin and really does help to keep your foundation looking fresh and not cake throughout the day. The scent is great and it will really last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Norris-Dixson

customer_reviews.title: Burns my skin in my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while before I actually used this and if I had used it right away, I would’ve returned it. It burns my eyes immediately after applying it to my skin. I had to wash it off. I use a variety of different products and nothing burns my skin from the fumes. I don’t know what the heck they put in the stuff but I can’t be good.
customer_reviews.author: B. Faubert

customer_reviews.title: Minimizes pores and lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first primer I have tried, wanted to minimize my pores. It seems to work pretty well and last all day. My skin feels super smooth and soft after I apply and makeup goes on nicely after. Would definitely recommend for the price, but I haven’t tried other products so I don’t know how it compares.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great primer for large pores !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely large pores so no matter what foundation I use it usually gets to a point where it starts to show my pores. Since using this primer I have been able to get that flawless application. Now I use it with or without make up and it makes my skin look flawless
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine WIltz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for large pores!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, its been probably the best as far as covering my larger pores, I always use a moisturizer anyway so I'm not really able to comment on that so that's why I gave only4 stars when rating, I'll definitely be purchasing it again. It's also a big bottle. I've spent a small fortune trying to cover up imperfections in the past and have been VERY disappointed! So it's well worth it and the price is just a plus...
customer_reviews.author: Mewkuz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing primer
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea how good this primer was until I switched to a different primer. I had run out of this primer and tried an elf primer that supposedly had great reviews, and my makeup fell off within an hour, became super splotchy, and the primer smelled horrible. When I went back to this primer, I could REALLY start to compare it to others. This keeps my makeup on all day, covers my pores, smells great, and feels awesome on my skin. Hands down the best primer I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: ... out on my hand at Sephora and fell IN LOVE. HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: I saw this and tested it out on my hand at Sephora and fell IN LOVE. HOWEVER, after purchasing this through Amazon and trying it on my actual face, it wasn't what I had expected it to be. I just didn't like the overall feel on my face and more importantly (to me), I don't like the smell of this primer, I almost hate it.
customer_reviews.author: anyjtay

customer_reviews.title: Good Product-Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem with this primer. It's everything everyone says. However I find that 3/4 of the way down the bottle, it stops pumping. I have to turn the bottle upside down and scrape the contents out with the little plastic tube. This has happened both times I purchased this. So I am going though it faster than I should. I won't get this again for that very reason.
customer_reviews.author: BookMistress

customer_reviews.title: FAV. Primer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I first got this in my boxycharm and instantly fell in love with it (have i said that i love this yet) !! This has become my FAVORITE primer to use daily. I usually cant get it from Sephora as it is usually out of stock, but it is cheaper here anyways!! I recommend trying this and you will love it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn!

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually very very impressed with this. I normally use N A R S smoothing primer and I would say this works just as well. It fills my pores and smooths my skin. I had pretty bad acne when i was younger so there’s some pitting and scaring but my foundation goes on so smoothly. I actually might not buy my expensive primers again.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Flawless, hydrating primer. 🌼
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. It's so hydrating and smells lovely. My makeup went on so nicely with this primer. My makeup lasted all day without any smudging. I already ordered another bottle haha Korean products have never failed me. I swear they have magic in them😃💜
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Begley

customer_reviews.title: Primer magic - HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: While I will be looking into natural products in the future, particularly those in my own language, but this stuff is MAGICAL. It slides on like a soft serum, but somehow instantly soaks into your skin, leaving behind a more even toned skin tone & matte-like finish. Again, can't even read the ingredients, so who knows what silicone science they've harnessed but this is a great product, especially for the price. WELL DONE y'all! Highly recommend this product who are looking for better coverage, with or without make up (I wear this under foundation, with only concealer, or with no makeup at all).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Curran

customer_reviews.title: does not work and seller does nto accept returns
customer_reviews.text: This product is a joke, and does not cover anything as it claims. You would have the same effect just spreading drops of water on your face. While I am not surprised about its uselessness, as I've seen it many times before with various cosmetical products, the worst part is that you cannot even return it. A complete disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: N. Weisheimer

customer_reviews.title: Pores? Never heard of her
customer_reviews.text: This primer is incredible, and the packaging feels very luxurious! I've tried Maybelline Baby Skin and Porefessional, and while Porefessional has been a step-up from Maybelline, I haven't had much success covering my nose pores. I decided to give this primer a go, especially since it's cheaper on Amazon than in-store, and I'm so glad I did. I can barely see my nose pores! It does seem to make pores that are usually not visible on my face visible, so I would recommend just using it in areas where your pores are more noticeable, and sticking to a regular primer for the rest of your face. Overall, an excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Primer for all ocassions and every skintone
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best primers i have used on my entire adult life.It is scentless, glides smoothly on the skin and applying makeup on it is amazing! I have recently started the korean skincare routine and this is my go-to primer. It works best in both cold and humid weather as i have tested it in both US and in India. If you want a nice dewy finish and baby soft skin, i highly recommend this product:)
customer_reviews.author: Nisheeta

customer_reviews.title: No clogged pores, silky smooth skin!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a free sample and I loved it so much I ordered it. It makes your skin feels so soft and smooth. It provides great coverage and I don’t even need foundation on top of it. My all day powder works wonderfully and it does not clog my pores the price is fantastic. Bravo Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: watrskiergurl

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I've never used anything for my face other than the normal, foundation and powder makeup. For the first time I decided to purchase something for my pores. I am 45 and things change : o One of the things I noticed was that I can see my pores allot more. When I got the product and started using it, people were asking me what I had done. I share this product name with anyone who asks. Share the love... Great product, I will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Not good doesn’t cover as primer should!! And no return on this item ! Just shameful
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Lage

customer_reviews.title: Best primer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Received this in my Boxycharm awhile back — I loved it so much that I used as little as possible each use to keep it as long as I could. 😂 It never occurred to me to check Amazon to keep it on my vanity at all times! It’s seriously the best primer I’ve ever used — best scent, texture, and longevity. The pores on my nose can be noticeable (to me) and once i use this, they’re basically invisible!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Garrison

customer_reviews.title: this may be a great cost effective option for you
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what is stated, I was really excited when I first put it on and saw the difference in my pores. Unfortunately, by the end of the day I had several new breakouts while wearing this. I have extremely sensitive skin, if you do not, this may be a great cost effective option for you. Its not greasy or oily, sits on the skin beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Best green concealer for redness
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the product I used way too much! To cover the redness under both eyes you only need a tiny drop and pat it into moisturized skin. I use a mineral powder foundation and it blends perfectly. I just bought the pink primer in this line and so far love that too. I use the primer all over and the green sparingly. Best primer and correcter and I have tried them all
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Great primer for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this primer twice now and I'm still loving it. For the price, you can't beat it, and you get A LOT of product! I have also introduced 2 of my friends to this primer by using it on them and now they are hooked as well! It does a pretty good job covering my pores and smooths my skin while moisturizing! Just don't use too much! I had a hard time getting used to only using a small amount! It WILL get oily if you do!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt impressed. My cheap wet n wild stick does a far better job. Make up doesnt stick well to this primer. Strong rosey sent. Wish it was returnable
customer_reviews.author: MNP

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & Sheer
customer_reviews.text: I got this product in a Boxycharm and fell in love immediately. I used to use This Works In Transit Camera Close-Up, but it just got too expensive. Once I tried this, that was it. This is all I use now. It’s so lightweight and sheer.
customer_reviews.author: VV0620

product_meta.title: TOUCH IN SOL No Pore Blem Primer, 1.01 fl.oz(30ml) 1 Pack - Face Makeup Primer, Big Pores Perfect Cover, Skin Flawless and Glowing, Instantly Smoothes Lines, Long Lasting Makeup's Staying
feature_bullets: Big pores, uneven texture – no problem! Pore perfecting primer leaves skin flawless and glowing – ready for a no-makeup day, or a makeup artists’ best face forward.
Lightweight formula that offers seamless coverage for pores, wrinkles + uneven complexion.
Green tea extract protects + energizes skin, acting as a perfect primer for color true, long-lasting makeup wear.
Infused with soluble collagen to help with skins moisture levels and elasticity.
For best results, apply an even layer after moisturizer – as the very last step before makeup application.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
